title.rendered: An incredible life awaits you at Gulshan Botnia – take a look!

content.rendered:
If you have been on the lookout for the perfect home—one that redefines freshness and is inviting like no other—then Gulshan Botnia is the address for you. Life at Gulshan Botnia is truly incredible and inimitably refreshing. Here’s why:

1. Refreshing lush green surroundings: Experience the true meaning of garden living at Gulshan Botnia. Refresh and revitalize your senses in the midst of greens, away from the chaos and pollution.

2. Outstanding amenities at the exclusive clubhouse: Enjoy a wide range of world-class amenities and conveniences at Gulshan Botnia’s exclusive clubhouse. The amenities include:

• Open badminton court
• Swimming pool
• Beauty salon
• Jogging track
• Play pan for kids
• Yoga/Aerobics zone

3. Living conveniences: A truly luxurious and comfortable life awaits you in the environs of Gulshan Botnia. With facilities like immaculate landscaping, rainwater harvesting, grand entrance lobbies, dedicated lift lobby, customer care centre, security systems, and many more unique and state-of-the-art conveniences, you are sure to enjoy a comfortable and enviable lifestyle.

4. Excellent design and exquisite interiors: With exquisite neo-classical facades, meticulous design and planning, and luxurious fittings and fixtures inside every home, there’s no other place you’d like to call home.

5. Perfect location: Gulshan Botnia offers you the perfectly green, serene and blissful living experience in the heart of Noida. Surrounded by a wide range of social and civic amenities, such as reputed schools, hospitals, shopping malls and multiplexes, Gulshan Botnia is the ideal urban address. The residential project is also located close to the Metro Station and offers quick and easy access to other parts of the NCR.

Discover your dream home at Gulshan Botnia located at Sector 144, Noida Expressway.
